column4: hey all. firefox takes up to 10-15 sec to load, is it a normal start up time, or it's actually a slow one?
to install chromium sudo add-apt-repository ppa:chromium-daily && sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install chromium-browser
i'll check it out, but i'm pretty fine with firefox for now. any clue on why it's not loading any faster?
might be some extensions causing that
disable all extensions, reboot and see if it helps

it's also weird, because it opens it up with a strange view while loading. this is a print screen of the 2sec it stays in that situation http://www.ShareCow.com/Download.aspx?request=2d6e4d5b-3a35-4a00-8bc2-77f08be3129a
you are using an older version of firefox. you might wanna try a newer version like 3.5.5
it's not in the repositories or..?
my mistake i thought you were using jaunty. but is it karmic?
offtopic but for future uploading images you can use imagebin.org
i was wondering about something similar, honestly :) thanks
